step.title: Range?
step.help-text: Is your donation available to a specific area or can it be shipped?

any.name: Shipping Available
any.description: Select this option if you are willing to ship your donation to someone outside of your area.

local.name: Local Only
local.description: Select this option to set up delivery or pickup options.

previous.label: Previous
previous.tooltip: Go back to the previous step
